item.title: Nasdaq Composite Leads Indexes Lower in Tech Pullback
item.description: U.S. stocks dropped as many investors were likely trimming risk from their portfolios and locking in gains for the year.

item.title: This New Year, Resolve to Take a WSJ Challenge
item.description: Sign up for one of our email challenges to start your year.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Extend Gains
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures pressed higher on forecasts for more lasting cold in January across key consumption regions.

item.title: Major Exchanges to Close Jan. 9 to Honor Death of Jimmy Carter
item.description: The exchanges separately said that their equity and options markets would be closed next Thursday for a national day of mourning.

item.title: Gold Futures Fall on Low Holiday Trading, Higher Dollar
item.description: Gold futures fell, but prices remained trading in a relatively narrow range on low holiday volumes.
